message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer ensures you get something now.
Alice, my turn. I believe in fairness, and this offer reflects the fact that we both lose out if this drags on.
Bob, time is money!  This offer is better than what you'll get in another round.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is the last round where my offer will be more than your previous one.  It's time to settle.
